name: TYTAN™ CP-317
description: TYTAN™ CP-317 is a coupling agent that can enhance the dispersion of inorganic fillers in polymer systems such as PP and PE by modifying the surface of filler particles. The content of fillers can therefore be increased, saving on the cost of polymer while maintaining the mechanical property.

Synonyms: Isopropoxytitanium triisostearate, Isopropoxytris(isostearato)titanium, Isopropoxytris(isostearoyloxy)titanium, Isopropyl titanium triisostearate, Isopropyl triisostearoyl titanate, Isopropyltriisostearate titanate, Titanium isopropoxide triisostearate, Titanium triisostearoylisopropoxide, Tris(isooctadecanoato-κ O)(2-propanolato)titanium
